title: Pr1 1
content:
+ Page 1

**//SCP RELATED ART://**

[[collapsible show="SCP-3000" hide="mmmmmmm fishey...."]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/5n9ludDm.png width="300px"]]
honestly, 3000 is one of the more overbuilt SCPs out there, and honestly I find the build up to how awesome it is by other people to sorta ruin it for me. it's not by any stretch of the word bad tho, and i really enjoyed the imagery of having ur entire life just light out of ur brain like a battery draining and then getting --vored epic style-- consumed and just... fucking melt away. that is pretty creepy.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-3138" hide="my sonamy shipping fanfiction has a lot more dead bodies then usual"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/DjXy3HTm.png width="300px"]]
mmmm 3138 was really good and fun i had to draw it. there is something really entertaining about hiding a body in a fucking book.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Eating Crow" hide="itchy and hungry"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/zgJzUWem.png width="300px"]]
i really enjoy the tone this story went through, and the fact it wasn't exactly based off any scp leads me to have a small headcanon about it. i should probably read the doomsday team about birds since i love birds so much.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-1026-RU" hide="best backscratcher"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/S8cFX8Qm.png width="300px"]]
1026-RU has the most cliche design, yet i love it so much. its one of the older russian scps so i guess it's excusable, plus its pretty entertaining to read. i really like the part when it got **//thick...//** after hearing about an all you can eat buffet being held at the foundation. it's a rlly odd one.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-471-JP" hide="he's a killer(?)"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/mvqkh8Um.png width="300px"]]
SCP-471-JP is one of my favorite -JPs, and I do really like my design for it. The fact that it's basically a urban legend made me helpless in giving him a really goofy looking "scary" face.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-1732-JP" hide="teach those plushes a lesson they will never forget"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/exIIWMem.png width="300px"]]
yea, this scp was weird. not even going to sugarcoat how weird it was. it. was. weird!!!
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Bobble's Basics In Education And Learning" hide="that's me!"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/EDBa05Hm.png width="300px"]]
this was a dumb crossover with SCP and an indie horror game i like that got fucking 300+ on reddit. i guess ill list down what all the characters are.
playtime is 053, baldi is 993, it's a bully is 303, the principle of the thing is 036-JP-1, arts and crafters is a sock with 1439 on it, and Gotta Sweep is 1837.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="682 bursting and transforming out of someone (idk)" hide="ow oof owie my mental and physical health"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/wn376Nwm.png width="300px"]]
i had fun making this one and i even put it in SCP-682-J.

you know, the entire reason i want to add this is because it's a fuck you to /r/SCP! some random asshole told me it was shitty and i got really stressed out cuz im a pussy and took it off. well now its officially on the wiki so take that random asshole.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="dont click its classified!!!!" hide="o fuck"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/DpO9DNnm.jpg width="300px"]]
it's 085 and 1005. i have no words
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-719-JP" hide="i for one, welcome our rhino overlords"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/k1bSxx7m.png width="300px"]]
it was fun to read and it was fun to draw, this SCP has it all, a play, rhinos, body horror, did i mention rhinos.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-2747" hide="[DATA LOST]"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/nWJ2xIfm.jpg width="300px"]]
I havenâ€™t seen a meta SCP done as well as 2747. minmin is prob one of my favorite SCP writers.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-374-JP" hide="i am a hobby"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/cZAQMChm.png width="300px"]]
SCP-374-JP is probably one of the weirdest metaphors for reeling in a fish and throwing it out. I love it so much.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-2107" hide="quench your fucking thirst with ghost juice"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/tF6OtQxm.png width="300px"]]
mmmm ahhh mmm *slurps the drink* wow what a good --unhealthy and highly unhealthy drink that large corporations profit on-- beverage
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-650-JP" hide="My flesh was just a doll that my heart was obsessed with"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/qi46ymXm.png width="300px"]]
all i can say is, what the fuck
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-194" hide="it would all be fine if we flew, flew away"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/LMjwCbam.png width="300px"]]
possibly one of the more liked things i have drawn, everywhere i have shown it has been given positive reception. myself, i cant stop looking at it. i rlly like how it turned out!
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-205" hide="shadow boyfriends"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/TdIc5b6m.png width="300px"]]
i made this for someone in the German Branch who said that it was their favorite and they would like to see a drawing of it. i decided to do one for them and they liked it.

how to draw and woman by pastarasta1
1. draw and person

2. adde dress....

3. add a hairi....

4. you fucking did it genius
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Bobble's Basics (new characters)" hide="no drawing dumb shit in the halls"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/UUb6WBAm.png width="300px"]]
baldi's basics recently had an update so i decided to draw the two new characters introduced.

1st Prize is 2521 and Filename2 (the character in the hidden ending) is 2786.

1st Prize is such a pain in the ass because he's just a more bothersome Gotta Sweep.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-582" hide="bundle bundle put me in a tundle"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/ecBmhlSm.png width="300px"]]
it's not slenderman

it's not slenderman

**it's not slenderman**

//**it's not slenderman**//

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-3640" hide="donald FUCK more like hahaha get it"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/EYNJyzWm.png width="300px"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/iGR8STMm.png width="300px"]]
ok this scp was rlly good. i really liked the part with the toy with all the weird shit inside. i want donald duck to vore me, put my bones in a suit, and then lay an eggs.

second image is animated check it out.

UPDATE: i redid the animation a bit and added a little more to it, i thought it was lacking a bit of pizazz. seizure warning.
[[image https://i.imgur.com/uYOhm7Gm.png width="300px"]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-3412" hide="life in a peaceful new world"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/ZKKz6Uzm.png width="300px"]]
god i love harsh noise music
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-3420" hide="dude weed lmao"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/s21t5zsm.png width="300px"]]
tfw you fucking electricity and then a fire ow oof owie's you
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-670" hide="it was just a scratch guys come on"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/NPBBuNcm.png width="300px"]]
hmm i really liked this one, also i based these designs on the really old images this scp used to have before they got removed because im a freak for staying on model with this kinda shit im obsessed with, AHAHHHHH.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-087 (animation)" hide="oh shit"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/h0EkZXwm.png width="300px"]]
hmmm scary stairwell man teaches me a lesson for touching the glassy scratches on the walls oh no.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-ES-070" hide="mental spores"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/zSI7Upom.png width="300px"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/a5dw07im.png width="300px"]]
i loved the absolute hell out of the pictures for this one so i drew stuff based off the images for it
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="bumaro x ion" hide="shipping is epic"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/oHiogvUm.png width="300px"]]
i went on the international scp discord and requested for requests and Zhange asked if i could do BumaroIon, I asked for references which is why they both look rlly similar to how zhange draws the two.

I think I did ok but I am bad at drawing clothing and stuff which is why my people are usually just bleach white and naked looking.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-140" hide="reading is cool"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/2IbJTGXm.png width="300px"]]
i did this one for Westrin and a lot of people really seem to enjoy it so i had to post it here.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-3012" hide="dorko"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/976amXMm.png width="300px"]]
this is honestly probably my favorite gaw mister/gaw skip. really crazy stuff and i love the character put into it.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-993" hide="Bobble's Sneaky Saturday"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/4SYVBFTm.png width="300px"]]
993 is a really good character that is slightly underrated in his more tale like appearances.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-3090 (animation)" hide="gamer girl"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/c8o96Qgm.png width="300px"]]
gaw is amazing ok
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Freedomkoo's Proposal - Badlands (-CN 001)" hide="like shaggy's proposal but less slimy and more edgy"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/fYiFLJTm.png width="300px"]]
from what i have seen of this SCP, i love it because i love the images and aesthetic of it. just pure spookyness.  
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-3367" hide="fuck"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/0KLLXsWm.png width="300px"]]
this is such a great scp honestly, i recommend everyone to read it. I did this as requested by the writer on reddit but I was totally planning on drawing it some time.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-3166" hide="garfield sucks eggs"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/ygqrcojm.png width="300px"]]
this is another request on reddit, it was really tough because im shit at drawing animals but i think i did ok, also its transparent because i figured out how to do that on my art program and i love it.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-003-KO" hide="hoodwinked 3"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/uTkwwx0m.png width="300px"]]
fairy tales am i right

--I thought love was only true in fairy tales--
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-ES-045" hide="ana"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/2Ly5leYm.png width="300px"]]
dolls be out here spooking it up.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-3127" hide="loss.jpg except its 3127 someone make this a thing"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/bjzsYk1m.png width="300px"]]
what the fuckaroo
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-3333" hide="skin"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/tMsb8WJm.png width="300px"]]
oh worm
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-3333 (rewrite)" hide="remember 3333? he's back, in pog form"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/mVj1HtPm.png width="300px"]]
not entirely sure how i feel about the rewrite but i really think the new monster is cute and this is hilarious to me so i decided to draw both meeting each other as a joke.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-307-JP" hide="hands the album"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/4sfruu3m.png width="300px"]]
can anthony fantano get on this album smh
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-1295-RU" hide="and then john was a zombie"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/IvUqO3tm.png width="300px"]]
mirrors are literally the worst thing to look at in horror.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-783" hide="oh no i cant get into the door because my long finger fingy fingders are too fucking long"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/ikKByMYm.png width="300px"]]
slenderman but he's even more of an asshole

edit: someone on reddit told me this sucks and it turns out they draw fnaf porn (pretty badly imo) and then I was insulted in another language being told that I was a capitalistic pig and I would die in a pit of mountain dew and doritos (because you know me, always liked doritos, totally.) It was fucking hilarious. thx fnaf porn lover for being a hilarious buffoon further proving that people dont hate my art as much as they just hate my style.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-2542" hide="burple weed"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/n3ZEXaqm.png width="300px"]]
oh damn oh fuck its weed elf!!!

--i wasn't totally accurate on design but I went off on what the SCP told me and it was a fun experience, this is a really cool SCP.--

actually it turns out i was pretty accurate THIS IS EPIC
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="LordStonefish's 4000 (w/ experimental animation)" hide="tf happen here lmao haha"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/rWLmPNym.png width="300px"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/J7NZmZNm.png width="300px"]]

I tried to capture the essence of this SCP with my drawing, I don't think I did very well but it was worth a shot, the animation is a test because the SCP is experimental so I tried being experimental and IDK if it worked, I'm trying new things and shit weee.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-1824-JP" hide="Gator Panic!"]]

probably one of the more simpler things I have done in quite a while, this doesn't even have my distinct square torso style stickfigure.  
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-280-FR (update: new picture!)" hide="(insert zootopia or animal crossing joke here)"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/a9TdoA7m.png width="300px"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/tYY5B5pm.png width="300px"]]
and this little piggy said "get back in the grinder"  

i can't get over that sheep i drew i love him omg

update: i can't get enough of 280-FR it turns out, i drew ANOTHER piece of it. i was inspired by shaggydreadlocks talking about faceless protagonists and i wanted to draw something that had the same feeling of a faceless protag, also yes, i can't get over the faces i drew for this one either, animals are the fucking best thing ever.

[[image https://i.imgur.com/uIGxigBm.png width="300px"]]
[[/collapsible]]
